strapiPost.title: New Pub in Downtown Rogers Hosts Grand Opening
strapiPost.content:
Pub on the Bricks launched last weekend in Downtown Rogers and will host its Grand Opening this weekend with live music by Blue Americana, performing Friday and Saturday, Sep 8-9.

A Family Affair: Located at The District, a newly renovated space at 106 W Elm St, Pub on the Bricks is owned by the Alexander family â€” longtime residents of Rogers and founders of the annual Pig Gig Arkansas festival.

Grab a Pint: Come enjoy the laid-back vibes, craft brew delights, live music, and good times! The new venue has indoor and outdoor seating and a finely curated selection of 14 Arkansas craft beers on tap, as well as a handpicked assortment of wines and domestic beers.

Follow Pub on the Bricks for updates HERE.
